p: The goodness of fit of the chosen models was tested using path sampling ( Baele et al., 2012). We tested the goodness of fit of (i) the clock model as well as (ii) the demographic model. As alternative models we used (i) a strict clock model and a relaxed clock model with exponentially distributed branch rates ( Drummond et al., 2006), and (ii) the commonly used constant coalescent model ( Kingman, 1982) and the Bayesian skyline model ( Pybus et al., 2000). The path sampling analyses were run for 30 steps with a chain length of 1.000.000 each and a pre-burnin of 50%.
